abstract: Federal authorities file papers in court that reveal Secret Service officers Lee Robert Moore was arrested for sending lewd text messages to person he believed was 14-year-old girl.
lead_paragraph: A Secret Service officer who worked at the White House sent lewd photographs of himself to whom he believed was a 14-year-old girl, according to court papers filed by the federal authorities.

headline.main: Secret Service Officer Is Accused of Sending Lewd Photographs
headline.print_headline: Secret Service Officer Is Accused of Sending Lewd Photographs
